A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Disappointing tripe that betrays every character you'll regret having  grown to love. Needlessly long\, this cure for insomnia has five false climaxes. For me that would be a great Saturday\, for a movie it's tedious and awful.  It\, like many products of its time exploits fan loyalty\, but don't get used to it Disney!
